panels.description: Service among cluster. Number of routes from proxy to server
Session are created between proxies(haproxy) and servers(postgres).
panels.title: Active Session

panels.description: Services SLI is measured by Average Service UP time of last 1 day

Service map tells whether a server can be used as a specific service/role/svc.
e.g Offline marks this server can be used as offline server
panels.title: ${pg_cls} Session Matrix

panels.description: Columns are proxies, Rows are target servers
panels.title: ${svc} Session Matrix

panels.description: All haproxy instances in this cluster ${cls}

▲ for out traffic
▼ for incoming traffic
panels.title: Traffic (by Proxy)

panels.description: All postgres instance among this cluster

▲ for out traffic
▼ for incoming traffic
panels.title: Traffic (by Server)

targets.expr:
1 * min by(ins,server) (haproxy_server_status{proxy="$svc", state="UP"})
+ 2 * min  by(ins,server)  (haproxy_server_status{proxy="$svc", state="DRAIN"})
+ 4 * min  by(ins,server)  (haproxy_server_status{proxy="$svc", state="MAINT"})
+ 8 * min  by(ins,server)  (haproxy_server_status{proxy="$svc", state="NOLB"})
